p: The samples of gel tablets were prepared as follows: gelatin was mixed with water and glycerol solution, and stored for 10–15 minutes to swell. After swelling, the gelatin solution was heated in a water bath (60 °C). Thyme syrup (room temperature) was added in the gelatin solution and mixed, then the preservative was added. The chewable gel tablets’ mass was poured in silicone forms and left for 24 hours to solidify (20 ± 5 °C). Gel tablets were removed from the forms and further investigations were carried out.
